mapper.select: SELECT dp.id AS playerId, dc.name AS characterName, dc.sex AS sex, dpr.is_sp AS isSp, dpr.identity_desc AS identityDesc, dpr.camp AS camp, dpr.position AS position, dpr.is_life AS isLife, dpr.is_mute AS isMute, dpr.action AS action, dpr.privilege AS privilege, dpr.feedback AS feedback, dpr.vote AS vote, dpr.submit_time AS submitTime, dpr.remark AS remark FROM d_game dg, d_player dp, d_player_record dpr, d_character dc WHERE dg.status > 2 AND dg.status != 9 AND dp.game_id=#{gameId} AND dp.id = dpr.player_id AND dpr.character_id = dc.id ORDER BY dpr.position
SELECT dc.name AS characterName FROM d_player dp, d_player_record dpr, d_character dc WHERE dp.id = dpr.player_id AND dpr.character_id = dc.id AND dp.game_id = #{gameId} ORDER BY dpr.position
SELECT drs.id AS id, drs.character_name AS characterName, drs.character_avatar AS characterAvatar, drs.is_mute AS isMute FROM d_replace_skin drs WHERE drs.player_id = #{playerId}

insert.if: UPDATE d_replace_skin drs SET drs.character_name = #{characterName}, drs.character_avatar = #{characterAvatar}, drs.is_mute = #{isMute} WHERE drs.id = #{id}
INSERT INTO d_replace_skin( player_id, character_name, character_avatar, is_mute ) VALUES( #{playerId}, #{characterName}, #{characterAvatar}, 0 )
